text:
[smallbatch-frontend/] 2 new commits:
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/1b3b9421eaedfcc7f1df1116118a91133169a758|1b3b9421eaed>: Added beer image to the beers page.
 - gastonfig
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/c2025967ead641e66668fcbf2e96d36862043f49|c2025967ead6>: Added guest tap asset.
 - gastonfig

[SmallBatch-CMS/] 3 new commits:
[SmallBatch-CMS/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-cms/commits/7f14ea48fdf3b7c64ac73641ce9a8d9b76b10966|7f14ea48fdf3>: removing flash of screend when no one's logged in
 - jenny_louthan
[SmallBatch-CMS/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-cms/commits/46267245863e30ca05e53a06eed9459dc1e3e04d|46267245863e>: headers no longer sticky
 - jenny_louthan
[SmallBatch-CMS/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-cms/commits/8dd0bdeb278cbcec0fc49de212dd2f6f207d2156|8dd0bdeb278c>: old beer thumbs
 - jenny_louthan
all comps with out of a scale of 100 were a typo.
is it easy to do decimals?
i can ask if decimals are allowed
dont want to complicate the rating system
i’d imagine it’s fine but gaston should say for certain
seems ridiculous to have a slider if it’s a discrete 1-10 rating though
Lots of things about this design seem ridiculous :wink:
oh oops i meant 1-10 in the above message
